job.title: Help Desk Technician
job.description:
Our Client, a national healthcare company is looking for people with outstanding phone/communication skills to work as part of their new digital support team that will assist phlebotomists with any IT issues. You will troubleshoot Level 1 over the phone and occasionally in person as part of a 24x7 call center. There could be some local travel. You must be a US citizen and be able to pass a background check and drug test.
Must haves:
Great Customer Service
Level 1 tech skills
Wants to grow in tech
Able to remotely troubleshoot issues
Possible travel up to 25% so  must have a vehicle
Remote and Nationwide
Windows 7 and Windows 10 install and troubleshooting
Familiarity with help desk ticketing systems
Familiarity with Active Directory and VPN big +
Network printer installation and configuration
Network printer installation and configuration
